Boards and Committees Land Use & Zoning Board Land Use The Town of Hilliard's Land Use Administrator, Lee Anne Wollitz, administers and enforces the provisions of the Zoning and Land Development Regulations as stated in the Hilliard Town Code. The Land Use Administrator works closely with the Building Inspector, Fire Marshal, Code Enforcement Officer and office staff in the street and utility departments to ensure that zoning and land use rules and regulations are being properly followed within the Town's corporate limits. Read More Share/Save through Social Media Boards and Committees [if IE]>

Town Council The Mayor and the Town Council serve as the governing body for the Town of Hilliard.  These elected officials represent and govern the Town, and provide for the needs of our community.  The Town of Hilliard takes great pride in the relationship between it's local government and it's citizens. The Council meets on the first and third Thursday of each month at Town Hall at 7:00 p.m. in the Council Chambers to conduct Town business and to provide the citizens with an opportunity to contribute their input.  Citizens are welcomed and encouraged to attend the meetings and to play an active role in their Town government and community. John Beasley Mayor jbeasley@townofhilliard.com Kenny Sims Council President/Street Commissioner ksims@townofhilliard.com Lee Pickett Council Pro Tem/Water & Sewer Commissioner lpickett@townofhilliard.com Jared Wollitz Fire Commissioner jwollitz@townofhilliard.com Dallis Hunter Airpark Commissioner dhunter@townofhilliard.com Joseph Michaels Parks & Recreation Commissioner jmichaels@townofhilliard.com Share/Save through Social Media Town Council [if IE]>
